aka: One point less on the sky(美国)
this_title: Un punto menos sobre el cielo
trans_title: One point less on the sky(美国)
introduction: One point less on the sky follows Miguel, a teenager that discovers an unexpected love for his best friend Lucas, who wants desperately to be a popular guy at school. Miguel tries to warning him that he doesn't have to be of that way, telling him that he's special for who he really is, but Lucas doesn't believe him. One point less on the sky (Spanish: Un punto menos sobre el cielo) is a 2016 dramatic short film that was directed by Roberto Carlos Marrero Pereira. The short had its world premiere on 10 June 2016 at Cinedfest, where it won two awards, for best actor and Distribución Internacional.
foreign_title: Un punto menos sobre el cielo
